Episodes.Title: Anjin
Episodes.Writer: Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks, James Clavell
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Destinies converge in Japan after a barbarian ship washes ashore in a poor fishing village. Meanwhile, in Osaka, Lord Toranaga finds himself outplayed by his enemies.

Episodes.Title: Servants of Two Masters
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Blackthorne's arrival in Osaka stirs up a hornet's nest of rivalries. Mariko is trapped between her cause and her faith when she must translate for the barbarian in Lord Toranaga's custody.

Episodes.Title: Tomorrow Is Tomorrow
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: After Blackthorne survives a brazen assassination attempt, Toranaga realizes he must ferry his allies out of Osaka or risk certain defeat.

Episodes.Title: The Eightfold Fence
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Blackthorne and Mariko test their new alliance as they train Toranaga's gun regiment for war. Yabushige must navigate his past promises to Ishido when an old friend comes to the village.

Episodes.Title: Broken to the Fist
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Blackthorne and Mariko struggle to contain the secret that could get them both killed. Yabushige searches for the spy who has betrayed his intentions to Lord Toranaga.

Episodes.Title: Ladies of the Willow World
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Lady Ochiba returns to Osaka in order to accelerate the Regents' campaign against Toranaga. In Ajiro, Toranaga tests Mariko's loyalty to his cause.

Episodes.Title: A Stick of Time
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Rachel Kondo, Justin Marks
Episodes.Actors: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai
Episodes.Plot: Outplayed by new alliances in Osaka, Toranaga is forced to carve out a new deal with a long lost family member.

Episodes.Title: The Abyss of Life
Episodes.Writer: Shannon Goss, Maegan Houang, Rachel Kondo
Episodes.Actors: Anna Sawai, Cosmo Jarvis, Hiroyuki Sanada

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.9
Episodes.Writer: Shannon Goss, Maegan Houang, Rachel Kondo
Episodes.Actors: Anna Sawai, Cosmo Jarvis, Hiroyuki Sanada

Episodes.Title: Episode #1.10
Episodes.Writer: James Clavell, Maegan Houang, Rachel Kondo
Episodes.Actors: Anna Sawai, Cosmo Jarvis, Hiroyuki Sanada
